title: 111_hr6328
content: Used Oil Re-Refining Tax Credit Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for 30 of the investment in a project to process qualifying re-refined lubricating oil from used oil. Defines qualifying re-refined lubricating oil as a base oil which meets the American Society of Testing and Materials standard for hydrocarbon lubricating base oil and which is manufactured from used lubricating oil. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury, in consultation with the Secretary of Energy, to establish a qualifying used oil re-refining project program for the deployment of used oil re-refining technologies.
